articles.author: Matt Kew
articles.title: Russell reckons he had pace to threaten Verstappen in F1 Qatar GP - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Mercedes Formula 1 driver George Russell reckons he could have challenged Max Verstappen for victory in the 2023 Qatar Grand Prix without his Turn 1 collision with Lewis Hamilton.
articles.content: Russell started the 57-lap run around Losail Circuit from second place but a superior launch for team-mate Hamilton, who lined up third on soft tyres, brought the pair together into the first corner.… [+2277 chars]
